scenario_text.value:
What is it?
Wait, are those...?!
Could these belong to Kaito and Dracumon...?

These are pretty distinctive footprints!
Good, they’re close to the school...

Yeah... But this is weird. They’re heading
in the wrong direction...

Yeah, you’re right...
The school is the other way.

Maybe the sun went down and he got lost
or something.
With Dracumon by his side? I don’t think so.

Oh, right... Well why, then?
Maybe he went looking for something?

(...I’ve got a bad feeling about this.
I’d better get everyone after him.)
